entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 30 March 2023
